gameplay.content: NodeOn Crypto is a crypto game where you can earn NDN coins, buy Pro status and invite friends to get rewards.

pro_status.title: Pro Status
pro_status.content: Pro status costs 1000 NDN and gives access to the referral program. With Pro status you can invite friends and earn rewards.

ndn.content: NDN is a game currency that can be bought with Telegram Stars and withdrawn back to Stars. NDN will soon be listed on exchanges!
